workflow.meta: Workflow to be used in HUB Service flow with JIRA Service Desk

action.name: Resolve
action.meta: This transition state the issue is moving to a field test to verify it's resolution

validator.arg: Set the first reminder date 7 working days after today

action.name: TransferToReporter
action.meta: Action used to respond to customer

validator.arg: Set the first reminder date 2 working days after today

action.name: Close
action.meta: This action closes the ticket assuming that the issue is validated from the field

action.name: TransferToSupport
action.meta: The opened issue should be assigned to a technician and checked

action.name: TransferToEngineering
action.meta: this issue need an Engineering Review

action.name: TransferToOperations
action.meta: Move the issue on Purchasing, Backoffice or in Production

action.name: Expiration for no answer
action.meta: too much time is passed without any answer

action.name: TimeRearm
action.meta: Loop Transition fro sending warning emails

action.name: ReOpen
action.meta: This issue needs to go back to the technical assistance
